snippet.title: Evercade - Toaplan Arcade 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
It's time to get back in the arcade with Toaplan Arcade 2. 7 more arcade greats from the veteran Japanese publisher come to Evercade, including TATE mode support on Evercade EXP!

Available April 2023
Pre-order from February 17th 2023

Find out more: https://evercade.co.uk/cartridges/toaplan-arcade-2/

Full Games List:
Demon's World
Fire Shark
Hellfire
Rally Bike
Twin Cobra
Twin Hawk
Wardner
